abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor and chairman of biotechnology company ImClone Systems fired off a letter to the chief executive of Bristol-Myers Squibb, calling Bristol’s revised take-over offer of $62 a share “absurd.”
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor and chairman of biotechnology company ImClone Systems fired off a letter to the chief executive of Bristol-Myers Squibb, calling Bristol’s revised take-over offer of $62 a share “absurd.”

headline.main: Icahn Calls New Bristol Bid For ImClone ‘Absurd’
